name: Captain's Hideaway

aboutTheProperty.body: Captain's Hideaway in Deer Park, Newberry, The Official Moose Capital of Michigan, offers a spacious layout that will accommodate up to 10 guests in utmost comfort. This 4 bedroom, 3 full bath home overlooking spectacular Lake Superior is every vacationer's dream. Spend your days hunting for agates on the beaches of Lake Superior, beach access is simply a few steps away from the back porch. If relaxing indoors is more your speed, spend the day lounging in the 4 season room that overlooks miles and miles of unobstructed views of Lake Superior. Lake Muskallonge is a short walk from the property and boasts terrific inland fishing, boating and much more! Grand Marais, MI is a short drive 18 miles west and is the eastern Gateway to Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore. The North Country Trail is accessible from the beach for endless miles of hiking or go fishing in the famous Two Hearted River. Trail maps are available in the house or download AllTrails app. Bring your clubs for golfing at beautiful Newberry Country Club. A stay at Captain's Hideaway will truly refuel your soul and provide unparalleled memories for years to come.facebook.com/captainshideaway1

items: Wifi speed: 100+ Mbps (good for 1 to 2 people or up to 6 devices)
Wi-fi and basic cable. Must turn on wi-fi calling to get cell service
Pots, pans, dishes, cleaning supplies, many condiments, cooking oils, spices, etc.
On the beach. Stairway to beach shared with neighbor to the west only. It is not for public use.
6 basic channels, smart TV to sign into your streaming apps.
Volleyball net, Bocci ball, baseball, football, sand toys
Parking available on either side of garage. Please do not drive on the lawn or neighbors property we have septic fields.
Muskallonge Lake is a short walk
The famous Two Hearted River close by
There is a Petsafe brand electric fence in front of the property that should work with any Petsafe brand collar you may have.

additionalRules: All dogs on property must be approved by owner. If dogs are left unattended in house for more than 2 hours, renter will forfeit security deposit.
No Pit Bull Terrier breeds of any kind.
If you are inquiring about an earlier check-in, call Elyse the day before your date for info.

damageAndIncidentals: Guests are responsible for any damage to the rental property caused by them or their party during the stay.
importantInformation: Government-issued photo ID and credit card, debit card, or cash deposit required at check-in
Special requests subject to availability and additional charges
Onsite parties or group events strictly prohibited
Safety features: carbon monoxide detector, fire extinguisher, smoke detector
